Rank.Description: Reduces pushback when damaged while casting damaging spells by 50%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 2.5m.
Reduces pushback when damaged while casting damaging spells by 100%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 5m. This range increase does not stack with other range increasing effects.

Reduces the cast time and mana cost of your Bolt of Judgment and Bolt of Retribution by 15%.

Ability.Description: Increases Armor by 3% and Base Health by 3%. Lasts 1h.
Grants a 20% chance when hit to deal 497 Death damage to up to 10 nearby enemies over 6s. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Increases your damage done using delayed and damage over time abilities by 2%.
Increases your damage done using delayed and damage over time abilities by 4%.
Increases your damage done using delayed and damage over time abilities by 6%.
Increases your damage done using delayed and damage over time abilities by 8%.
Increases your damage done using delayed and damage over time abilities by 10%.
Your Vex and Scourge restore health equal to 3% of your Maximum Health over their duration.
Your Vex and Scourge restore health equal to 6% of your Maximum Health over their duration.

Your damaging Life and Ethereal spells (including each tick of Nysyr's Rebuke and Soul Stream) reduce the cast time of your next Bolt of Depravity by 0.2s, as well as reducing its mana cost by 3%. Max 4 stacks.

Your damaging Life and Ethereal spells (including each tick of Nysyr's Rebuke and Soul Stream) reduce the cast time of your next Bolt of Depravity by 0.4s, as well as reducing its mana cost by 6%. Max 4 stacks.

Your damaging Life and Ethereal spells (including each tick of Nysyr's Rebuke and Soul Stream) reduce the cast time of your next Bolt of Depravity by 0.6s, as well as reducing its mana cost by 10%. Max 4 stacks.

Ability.Description: Knocks the enemy back and snares them, reducing their movement speed by 30%, for up to 10s.

Rank.Description: Your Bolt of Depravity and Soul Drain increase non-Physical damage taken by 2.5% for 30s.
Your Bolt of Depravity and Soul Drain increase non-Physical damage taken by 5% for 30s.
Increases your single target damage done by 3%.
Increases your single target damage done by 6%.
Increases your single target damage done by 9%.
Increases your chance to Critically Hit with damage over time abilities by 5%. Your damaging single target channels reduce the cooldown of other single target damaging channels by 1.5s.
Increases your chance to Critically Hit with damage over time abilities by 10%. Your damaging single target channels reduce the cooldown of other single target damaging channels by 3s.

Ability.Description: Grants immunity to the next Fear. Lasts 60s.

Rank.Description: Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Vex, Scourge, and Sanction Heretic by 15%. Your single target channeled abilities apply Mental Resilience, increasing your damage by 2% for 30s.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Vex, Scourge, and Sanction Heretic by 30%. Your single target channeled abilities apply Mental Resilience, increasing your damage by 4% for 30s.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Vex, Scourge, and Sanction Heretic by 45%. Your single target channeled abilities apply Mental Resilience, increasing your damage by 6% for 30s.

When Life and Death Concord reaches 4 stacks, your next Bolt of Depravity can be cast instantly. Reduces the Global Cooldown of Bolt of Depravity to 1 second. After consuming Unified Theory, you gain 2 stacks of Echoing Concord, reducing the cast time of Bolt of Judgment and Bolt of Retribution by 0.5 seconds.

Ability.Description: Forces the next damaging Life or Death spell to Critically Hit. Lasts 30s.

Rank.Description: The immunity granted by your Perseverance now covers all control effects.

Ability.Description: Deals 3001 Death damage over 7s to up to 5 enemies in the target area.

Rank.Description: Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Bolt of Judgment, Bolt of Depravity, and Bolt of Retribution by 4%.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Bolt of Judgment, Bolt of Depravity, and Bolt of Retribution by 8%.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Bolt of Judgment, Bolt of Depravity, and Bolt of Retribution by 12%.
Your Bolt of Depravity deals an additional 10% of its damage over 3s. This damage is dealt instantly if the enemy already has your Symbol of Corruption.
Your Bolt of Depravity deals an additional 20% of its damage over 3s. This damage is dealt instantly if the enemy already has your Symbol of Corruption.
Your Bolt of Depravity deals an additional 30% of its damage over 3s. This damage is dealt instantly if the enemy already has your Symbol of Corruption.

Ability.Description: Increases damage done by 10% and Critical Hit chance with damaging abilities by 5%. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Your Fanaticism adds 1 stack of Fanatic's Faith, increasing your Critical Hit chance with damaging Life or Death spells by 10% per stack. Each Critical Hit with a damaging spell reduces the stack by 1.

Your Fanaticism adds 2 stacks of Fanatic's Faith, increasing your Critical Hit chance with damaging Life or Death spells by 10% per stack. Each Critical Hit with a damaging spell reduces the stack by 1.

Your Fanaticism adds 3 stacks of Fanatic's Faith, increasing your Critical Hit chance with damaging Life or Death spells by 10% per stack. Each Critical Hit with a damaging spell reduces the stack by 1.
Your single target spells ignore 15% of the target's Resistance.
Your single target spells ignore 30% of the target's Resistance.

AbilityRank.Description: Restores 5% mana each second over 10s.

Reduces the global cooldown of the Cleric's abilities by 0.5s, and their mana costs by 33%. Allows the Cleric's damaging abilities to ignore 20% of their targets' Armor and Resistance. Deals 1164 to 1287 Life damage.
